org.osate.ge.aadl2.ui

Class AadlModelAccessUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osate.ge.aadl2.ui.AadlModelAccessUtil

  • public class AadlModelAccessUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for accessing AADL declarative model model elements while respecting project references and the live Xtext resource set.
    Since:
    2.0

      AadlModelAccessUtil()

      static java.util.Collection<IEObjectDescription> getAllEObjectsByType(IProject project, EClass type)
      Gets a collection containing all EObjects of a specified type which may be directly referenced from the specified project
      static java.util.Collection<IEObjectDescription> getAllEObjectsByType(Resource resource, EClass type)
      Gets a collection containing all EObjects of a specified type which may be directly referenced from the project containing the specified resource.
      static java.util.Collection<IEObjectDescription> getContainedEObjectsByType(IProject project, EClass type)
      Returns the EObject of the specified type which are contained in the specified project

      • calculateVisibleResourceDescriptions

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<IResourceDescription> calculateVisibleResourceDescriptions(IProject project)
        Returns the resource descriptions from all containers visible from the specified project.
        Parameters:
        project - the project for which to get the visible resource descriptions
        Returns:
        a steam of resource descriptions accessible from the project.
        No Reference:
        This method is not intended to be referenced by clients.

      • calculateResourceDescriptions

        public static java.util.Set<IResourceDescription> calculateResourceDescriptions(java.util.Set<IProject> projects)
        Returns all the resource descriptions in the specified projects.
        Parameters:
        projects - the projects for which the return the resource descriptions.
        Returns:
        the set of resource descriptions.
        No Reference:
        This method is not intended to be referenced by clients.
